sentences.en: ...a reproduction of a popular religious painting.
Bacterial reproduction is accelerated in weightless space.
sentences.cn: 在失重的空间,细菌繁殖加快了.

sentences.en: Genes are those tiny bits of biological information swapped in sexual reproduction.
sentences.cn: 基因是在有性繁殖中交换的微小生物信息。

sentences.en: Her description of the meeting is an exact reproduction of the reunion.
sentences.cn: 她对会面的描述是这次团聚的真实再现.

sentences.en: I bought a reproduction of a famous painting for my room.
sentences.cn: 我买了一幅名画的复制品来装饰房间.

sentences.en: Reproduction is constant irrespective of climate and other variations.
sentences.cn: 不管气候与其他环境条件如何变化,繁殖能力维持恒定.

sentences.en: Scientists studied the reproduction, diet, and health of the dolphins.
sentences.cn: 科学家研究了海豚的繁殖情况、进食规律和健康状况。

sentences.en: The ascospores, on the other hand, are produced by following sexual reproduction.
sentences.cn: 另一方面, 子囊孢子是在有性生殖之后产生的.

sentences.en: The craftsmen have ensured faithful reproduction of the original painting.
sentences.cn: 工匠保证要复制一幅最接近原作的画.

sentences.en: The efficiency of reproduction may decline as a result of seasons.
sentences.cn: 繁殖效率可能受季节的影响而下降.

sentences.en: The new plant forms new bulbs in vegetative reproduction.
sentences.cn: 增殖性繁殖新株长成新鳞茎.

sentences.en: The plant or animal has , in general, the power of reproduction.
sentences.cn: 一般说来, 植物或动物有生殖能力.

sentences.en: The quality of reproduction isn't very good on this recording.
sentences.cn: 这录音的复制质量不太好.

sentences.en: The reproduction and growth of the cancerous cells can be suppressed by bombarding them with radiation.
sentences.cn: 可以通过放疗杀死癌细胞来抑制其再生和扩散。

sentences.en: The trees will propagate themselves by the reproduction of their seed.
sentences.cn: 这些树将通过种子的再生而自行繁殖.

sentences.en: Use a black pen on white paper to ensure good reproduction.
sentences.cn: 用白纸黑笔，以确保复印清晰。

sentences.en: We have been able to divorce sex from reproduction.
sentences.cn: 我们已经能够将性和生育完全分开了。

words.tran_cn: 可再生的；可繁殖的；可复写的
扬声器；复制程序；再生器
复制；再生；生殖；使…在脑海中重现
[生物]繁殖，生殖；[古]复制；复制品

phrases.tran_cn: 重放质量；重现性；一致性
（电影）还音；重新放音；声重发；放声

trans.tran_cn: 繁殖，生殖，再生产，再现，[心]再生作用，复制品
trans.tran_en: the act or process of producing babies, young animals, or plants
